04 Apr 2020

New Hobbies

#CoronaGoals

Before you continue please make sure you have read our blog on whether you are in the right mental state to even try a new hobby.

If you have read our article and are looking for inspiration of what to do with your time please proceed to view below!

Remember: Routine is key

  1. learn a language (I have been living in The Netherlands for over a year and still am not fluent)
  2. learn an instrument (or even sing)

  3. Try that recipe you've been meaning to try

    Applie pie? Cookies? Banana bread?

  4. Do a handstand
  5. Run a half marathon (if you are still allowed to go on runs)
  6. reorder your cupboards
  7. Make your own facemask (beuty-wise or to prevent the spreading of germs)
  8. Making home-made hand sanitizer
  9. Home workouts
  10. Home-made brunch

    (better than going out if it is done well!)

  11. Reconnect with your religion
  12. Read a book
  13. Reconnect with relatives who might be going through a lonley time
  14. Do an online course
